text: I used to say, 'Man, I think I'd be a really good dad. I'll be a great provider. I'm funny I'll go on trips with them - I'll do all sorts of stuff.' But the momming? I'm not made for that. I have a really good mom I know what she put into it.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

text: Washington has got to, across the board, lower taxes for small businesses so that our mom and pops can reinvest and hire people, so that our businesses can thrive.
author: Sarah Palin

text: I'm really happy to be a mom, and I'm proud of the phase I'm in.
author: Liz Phair

text: Mom ran the house, so we grew up Portuguese.
author: Emeril Lagasse

text: My food is Louisiana, New Orleans-based, well-seasoned, rustic. I think it's pretty unique because of my background being influenced by my mom, Portuguese and French Canadian. There's a lot going on there.
author: Emeril Lagasse
